http.title: Site Not Configured | 404 Not Found
http.html:
404

The site you were looking for couldn't be found.

This domain is successfully pointed at WP Engine, but is not configured for an account on our platform.

  • If you just signed up, we're still likely creating your account.
  • Did you add this domain to your install?
  • Did you point DNS to the correct IP address or CNAME?
If you've completed the steps above, or need more help, please contact us and we can help get your site up and running in no time.

Hosted by

  • Mt. Carmel Community Center

    Building a Strong Community

  • Mt. Carmel Chapel

    A Place for Reflection

Mt. Carmel Community Center

The Ziccardi Hall, Garden View Room, Emily’s Reflection Garden and the Mezzanine are available for meetings, video conferences and other events. There is also the amphitheater which serves as the perfect setting to showcase performances.
Mon-Fri 8am to 5pm
719-845-4800

Mt. Carmel Chapel

Mt. Carmel Chapel is open daily for reflection. Chapel is available for non-denominational spiritual celebrations and other special events. Our Chapel converts into a theater with stage lighting, state of the art audio/visual equipment.
Mon-Fri 8am to 5pm
719-845-4800

Emily’s Kitchen and Garden Cafe

View Menu Here

Mission: Mt. Carmel provides wellness and community partnerships that attract business, cultural and social opportunities.

A 501(c)(3) nonprofit owned by the community and reports to a local Board of Managers.


Mt. Carmel collaborates with community partners to provide wellness and transition services that nurture mind, body, and spirit.


Mt. Carmel Center
911 Robinson Ave
Trinidad, Colorado 81082
Phone – 719-845-4800

Mt. Carmel Chapel
Hours – Monday-Friday – 9am-5pm

Mt. Carmel Health, Wellness & Community Center
Mt. Carmel © 2018. All Rights Reserved.
